poem:
{0}'s life has been the poem I would have writ
But I could not both live and utter it

Cerulean's blue
Emerald's green
{0} is the queen
Yes, {0} is the queen

I love {0},
{0} loves me.
How we met
is a mystery.

Buster, Sparkle, Newbie, Speedy
and then there's {0}, our smallest kitty.
One, two, three and four and five,
they're so frisky, so alive.

{0} is always right.
Get used to it.

Roses are red,
Violets are blue,
Sugar is sweet
and {0} is too.

If I had a flower for every time I thought of {0},
I could walk in my garden forever.

Roses are red,
Violets are blue,
If I had a flower
{0}, I'd give it to you.

Roses are red,
Violets are blue,
When I dream at night,
{0}, I dream of you.

Roses are red,
Violets are blue,
I'd never met perfection,
{0}, until I met you.

{0}, you're the type of person
That makes forever seem too short.

{0}'s love is like a red, red rose
Which is better than a rubber hose
up your nose

{0} brought me sunshine
when I saw only rain,
{0} brought me laughter
when I felt only pain.

I love {0} for a life time,
Not only a day
I love {0} for who you are,
not what you do or say.

I keep myself busy
with the things I do.
But every time I pause,
{0}, I think of you.

{0} sticks with you till the end,
like a straight line that will not bend.

{0} is whatever a moon has always meant,
 and whatever a sun will always sing.

I want to get close to {0} like
shoes with laces,
teeth with braces,
Orasentencewithnospaces.

The apple of my eye,
The gem of my heart,
{0}, nothing in the world
Will keep us apart.

For where ever in this world you may roam,
in my heart {0} will always be home.
admire: Everything else is insignificant compared to the beauty of {0}! :heart_eyes:
{0}, you shine so bright the stars envy you! :star2:
{0} is as wonderful as they come! :heart_eyes:
{0}, everything you touch turns to gold! :heart_eyes:
Colours seem so much brighter when {0} is around! :rainbow:
There is ordinary, and then there is {0}! :heart:
Is that {0}'s picture next to 'charming' in the dictionary? :wink:
I bet {0} wakes up flawless every day. :wink:
{0}, is it tough always being the most beautiful person in the discord? :heart:
After seeing {0}, my face hurts from smiling so much! :smiley:
{0}, you made my heart skip a beat! :heart:
I've been waiting my whole life to meet someone like {0}! :heart_eyes:
{0} must be an angel sent straight from heaven! :angel:
appreciate: {0}, everything you touch turns to gold!
pickup: Is {0} a magician? Because whenever I look at you, everyone else disappears.
I'm no photographer, but I can picture {0} and me together.
They say disneyland is the happiest place on earth. Well apparently, no one has ever been standing next to {0}.
For some reason I was feeling a little off today, but now {0}'s definitely turned me on.
{0}, I seem to have lose my phone number. Could I borrow yours?
Is {0} a parking ticket? Cause you've got fine written all over you.
{0}, are you tired? You've been running through my mind all day.
Is there an airport nearby or did {0} just make my heart take off?
I was wondering if anyone had an extra heart - {0} just stole mine.
{0}, would you grab my arm, so I can tell my friends I've been touched my an angel?
{0}, kiss me if I'm wrong, but dinorsaurs still exist, right?
Did the sun come out or did {0} just smile at me?
Hi, {0}. How was heaven when you left it?
{0}, you're pretty and I'm cute. Together we'd be Pretty Cute.
I must be in a museum, because {0} truly is a work of art.
{0}, are you my phone charger? Because without you, I'd die.
{0} doesn't need a licence to drive me crazy.
Is {0} a dictionary? Cause you're adding meaning to my life.
{0} must be a broom, 'cause you just swept me off my feet.
I must be a snowflake, because I've fallen for {0}.
{0}, I know you're busy today, but can you add me to your to-do list?
{0}, are you lost? Because heaven is a long way from here.
{0} spends so much time in my mind I should charge rent.
My lips are skittles - {0}, want to taste the rainbow?
Here I am, {0}. What were your other two wishes?
{0}, your lips look so lonely... would they like to meet mine?
{0}, your belly button is kind of adorable.
